Reviews.Title: Great Starter Kit
Reviews.Author: peggy
Reviews.Content: My husband and I purchased this for our hiking trips as well as recreational farm visit photography outtings. This kit truly provided us with everything to start.-It had a  lovely standard burgundy nikon camera strap provided. I will be returning the one I purchased because I didnt know that one was included with the set.-The body is beautiful. The burgundy/red color is very rich and doesn't look corny or odd. It's quite attractive.-The lenses are great starter lenses to help us begin shooting and getting familiar with the mechanics of the camera while providing an excellent focal range.-The memory card records pictures quite fast - I thought it would be slower.-The kit is extremely self explanatory and the body and lenses all come with the manufacturer warranty which can be registered online. Nikons product registry site is very well laid out and helpful (worth registering).-Monopod is great - very compact and can expand to a surprising length. The base is equipped with a rubber foot that also screws upward to expose a metal spike which can be used to steady the monopod on soft ground. (similar mechanism to the IKEA rubber leveler feet)-500mm telephoto lens is indeed not the same quality as a Nikkor lens but we feel that it is an excellent way to try experimenting with a lens of that type and skill level with a minimal investment compared to its Nikkor equivalent.-The remote uses an infared sensor and therefore the wifi adapter is not needed for it to be able to function. We however still bought the wifi adapter so we could easily transfer photos to our smartphones.-The adaptive lenses (telephoto and wide angle) are interesting to play with however the one does not truly help to achieve a true wide angle lens affect. The wide angle adapter when zoomed out to it fullest has a black circle around the picture which cuts off the corners of the picture and therefore somewhat nullifying its effectiveness.-The backpack. We were surprised by how well this suited our needs. We go hiking and the back pack has substantial back padding and support. The bag fits everything in this kit very comfortably and leaves room for additional objects if you plan out your space accordingly. Its very well padded throughout. The padded spacers are adjustable with velcro side flaps. All around a great bag.-Kit also comes with all the adapters you would need for the body and the lenses and for a first time dslr owner - its very well explained.*As beginners to the dslr world we are extremely happy with our purchase. This is a great foundational purchase as well as leaves us room to grow into more skillful lens types once we better understand the type of photography we will be mainly focusing on.*

Reviews.Title: Great package!
Reviews.Author: Claire K.
Reviews.Content: Fabulous package deal. I researched the individual components and this seems to be a good deal. I love the camera and all the goodies included. Great customer service as well.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera, Bundle, Delivery.
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: All items shipped as advertised and in excellent condition. Kudos to the merchant.We are still learning all that the camera has to offer, but using the auto settings makes it easy to take excellent pictures right out of the box. They candy apple red was a BIG winner with the women in the family!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Leland Krein
Reviews.Content: Was just what I ordered works great backpack a little small for all the lenses would order it again thanks

Reviews.Title: Nikon Kit
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: I love this kit. I am still learning how to use everything. This camera takes great pictures. The super high resolution allows me to crop photos and blow the picture up large for making posters. I am having a lot of fun with it.

Reviews.Title: All in one!
Reviews.Author: AG
Reviews.Content: This was an anniversary gift for my wife and she loves it.  Everything she needs is included in the package. This is great!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera !
Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: Great Camera ! Nice Camera bag ! Lots Of good Stuff For the price.This is my Second Digital Camera First one being a Sony MVC-FD91 ( floppy Disk for A memory Card ).The Nikon D5200 ( body and the 18-55 lens )  Is cheaper than the Sony 14 years ago .There is A lot I have to learn about the Nikon . Great pictures right out of the Box I downloaded the manual And read it while I waited for the Camera , Which I received before  Amazon said it would get to me.I will  send an Update When I use the Camera more ... For Now  I'am very pleased with this Camera/Bundle .Wayne

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: MBN
Reviews.Content: Perfect in every way.  Great color and amazing accessories.  Takes awesome pictures!  We bought this for an Alaska Cruise and we captured many fabulous pictures with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Going to enjoy!
Reviews.Author: dgreenox4
Reviews.Content: I have not used a great deal yet, however, it has the features that I was looking for. Can't wait to use more.

Reviews.Title: A perfect fit....
Reviews.Author: Sammy Yip
Reviews.Content: It was a birthday gift for my daughter. She loves the camera. She has a Nikon D40 before and this can do so much more.
